name: Being a jerk with Noise
description: updated list from my stimhack thread: http://forum.stimhack.com/t/hemorrhage-might-be-the-return-of-noise/649/84

name: Building a Richer world
description: My objective is to have tons of money with Geothermal Fracking, Melange and tons of transaction to rez ice, advance and maybe scorch the runner. It's not a very special deck at all, but I would appreciate some feedback.

name: little girl 40
Test Run Andy
description: few cards off from my store championship winning version

name: Chaos Theory - The Shaper Pride
description:
This deck is realy fun, and dont need more economy to bite Corporation. IM not sure only about :

  • Rabbit Hole 3x - Best for NBN trace and some cards like Cadaceus.
  • Underwold Contacts - Synergy with Hole, not so hard to stack. 2-3 gold per turn + Opus is enough but !

I know there is some nice option like Infiltration (last time I Inside Job Project Junebug in Weyland -.-') or Esher.

Comment and Subscribe ! :)

name: HNBN:RSVP vHJ 1.0
description: An RSVP idea I had to hide agendas behind a remote with rsvp protecting the remote. Runner must break it or be unable to beat ASHs trace. Extra RSVP can protect R&D and/or remotes with assets in them. I'm still debating 3 WoS for the 3 paper wall just for more ICE the runner has to actually break. I'm also debating -3 Sweeps week, -3 paper wall for +3 wraparound and +3 Green/Blue level clearance. I'll need to work the ICE around to make up the extra 3 INF if I do that though. suggestions? My tournament is tomorrow. Thanks. :)

name: Quicksandteki H&P
description:
This is based on a very frustrating RP deck I played against this week, which we both recognised will gain a lot with the release of the next two sets so it's updated to Honor & Profit.

Aside from Chimera all the Ice is designed to be frustrating for the runner to break easily with the standard breakers (Eli: 4 with Corroder, Wall of Thorns 5, Inazuma and Tollbooth bug both Yog.0 and Gordian, Ichi, Komainu and Tsurigi have multiple routines to break with Mimic).

You tax and you tax and you tax, until the runner feels like they're running through treacle to get anywhere because everything is expensive. Your Agendas are all either difficult to steal (NAPD, Future Perfect) or feed back into frustrating runs (Nisei).

And, yes, it has Caprice Nisei. She will make you hate this game because she is silly.

name: Gabe the Rabe
HNBN:RSVP vHJ 2.0
description: New build with suggestions from X3r0H0ur for an hourglass, RSVP, strongbox, ASH remote server. I'm still concerned about a Yog breaker "only" needing two sucker tokens total to bypass the hourglass and RSVP but Yog is fairly rare in my meta so I may get away with it. Adonis is still a possible cut for Blue level clearance but I feel Adonis hidden behind an extra RSVP is better.

name: GRNDL 0.4
description:
My attempt at a GRNDL deck. So far it's doing fine on OCTGN. I've played around with a variant that removes the 3 snares to gain influence to replace the 2 Hadrian's walls by 2 Flares. Then I add 2 Elizabeth Mills and a Subliminal Messaging to fill the deck (I love that card.) I haven't tried that variant much yet but I'm curious to see how it does.

That deck has a really solid economy and is able to quickly build a remote where it can score agendas. Snares, SEA Source, Scorched Earth and Punitive Counterstrikes also provide a threat that tends to slow down the runner and make him careful.

name: Exile Ice Removal and Derez
description: DACrypt

description: DACrypt

name: Chairman Hiro's Ronin
description: DACrypt

name: RSVP regrets only. 3.0
description: I have a tournament tomorrow and I'm working through a couple deck concepts involving RSVP and ASH keeping the runner out of the remote long enough to score and protecting SanSan Grid in the meantime. I've been tinkering with a concept of excess code gates vs less code gates on the principle that excess CG ICE will require too many sucker tokens to keep Yog as abusive as the runner would like. The other breakers are still going to be taxed by the ICE with torch (an uncommon breaker in my meta so far) being the most efficient.

name: Drain Bramage 2.1
description: The updates added 3 Bastion for hard ETR. I want some porous ICE to tax actions for Punitive setup/Overwriter trapping.

name: Whizzard of New Angeles
Account Siphon Theory
description: Steal their money, kill their ice, lock R&D.

name: Gabe
NBN
Andromebot (Action Comics Las Vegas Store Championship 1st P
description: Pretty straight forward deck that forces them to ice HQ and then you can either win with R and D lock or with Sneakdoor. My one game against Jinteki I had both Yog and Crypsis die to Net Damage on back to back turns. Luckily was able to drain the corp of money and win with R and D lock.

name: Psycho Scorcher (Action Comics Las Vegas Store Championship
description:
Was torn on bringing this to a 2nd store championship because my local meta was very familiar with it. However that didn't change its effectiveness and glad I stuck with it because I only lost 1 game with it between 2 store championships.

Deck has 3 win conditions! 1. Scorched Earth from Sea Source or Midseasons Tags 2. Fast Advance 3. Psycho Beale

Some people might ask the following questions:

Why not just play Making News and get the extra 3 influence? Because the max hand size of 6 is much more valuable to me than the 2 trace credits are. Might run 2 traces all game and more than likely have plenty of money to win the trace outright. With a Max Hand Size of 6 it makes HQ runs less likely to score for the runner and I can hold onto a Midseasons and Psychographics for awhile without having to dump agendas as much into archives.

Why 49 cards in TWIY*? So started this deck as an achievement deck for a league to get 2 achievements. Those 2 achievements were score a 5 pt. Psycho Beale and have less than 10 ice in your deck. Eventually went up to 49 cards to add the extra win condition of Fast Advance. Its original version had no SanSan's in it. The 49 card variety has worked great and even though its low on ice a single Data Raven on HQ and R&D will work wonders in the early game. Also I use Jackson mostly for card draw and to recycle economy. Don't have to use him too often to save dumped agendas.

Between 2 store championships I took 2nd in one and 1st in another. One game I won with a 5pt. Beale. At least 2 other games won with Scorched Earth including a Triple Scorched when the guy had 2 Plascretes out.

name: Weyland - Everybody Hates Us, And We Don't Care
description:
Adaptation of my earlier Weyland deck, minus the stuff that removes bad publicity. It's big, big money driven by lots of bad publicity, and with Off the Grid you can focus on protecting just your 3 central servers with some very tough and expensive ice.

I went from GRNDL to BABW because I wanted some extra influence for a couple of Toll Booths. I also plan to mix in some Elizabeth Mills & Veterans Programs some time to see if reducing the bad publicity helps even a little, but for now I'm going full LOL IDC :)

Feedback appreciated!

name: Sundew in the Morning
Building a Richer World 2.0
description:
I want to have tons of money with 9 transactions, Corporate War and Geothermal Fracking to rez ice and scorch the runner, I dropped 2 Data Ravens and added 2 SEA Source, I will use Oversight AI to rez some of my bigger ICE and with Bad Publicity being a thing in my deck I added 1 copy of Ireress, I have also taken out 1 copy of Viper to fit 1 Power Grid Overload, those are the major changes compared to the first version of this deck. (I dont know how to use the "Derived From" and "Inspiration For" feature of Netrunnerdb.com if someone knows, it would help me)

Huge thanks to the user Maugman who helped me improving this deck!

name: Painting Kit
description: My idea for making Yogosaurus really sing with paintbrush.

name: Kit painting destruction
description: Paintbrush and Tinkering makes Torch sing together with Kit's ability. Test run or SMC out the programs. Test run combo with either Eureka or Scavenge. Parasite and 'sucker to keep the ICE from getting out of hand.

name: Reina - Chessmaster
description: Just something I am working on.
